All Classes

Class
Description
Customer
Represents a single customer
Desserts
Represents a specific Desserts item in the Desserts menu
DessertsMenu
Contains all functionalities specialized to the Desserts Menu
Drinks
Represents a specific drink item in the drink menu
DrinksMenu
Contains all functionalities specialized to the Drinks Menu
GenericMenu
Serves as the parent class of all the menus.
GenericMenuItem
Serves as the parent class of all the menu items
IndividualSales
Represents/tracks the sales of an individual item for a year
ItemOrder
Stores the details (Qty and total price) of a single item within an order
MainCourse
Represents a specific MainCourse item in the MainCourse menu
MainCourseMenu
Contains all functionalities specialized to the Main Course Menu
Menu
A Menu interface which to allow the use of polymorphism.
MenuControl
Serves as a common class for the user to choose the appropriate menu (Main Course, Drinks, Etc) and the actions they want to perform on the menu (Update, Create, Remove)
MenuItem
A menu item interface which to allow the use of polymorphism
ObjectCreator
Represents the class used to read and write objects to the text file
Order
Stores all the order details pertain in a single customer
OrderInvoice
Used to generate the bill for the overall meal ordered by the customer
PromotionalMenu
Contains all functionalities specialized to the Promotional Menu
PromotionalSetPackage
Represents a PromotionalSetPackage item in the promotional menu
Reader
Used to read input from the user with exception handling
Reservation
Tracks the reservation for an entire day (Each reservation object corresponds to one day)
RestaurantApp
main application that is used to coordinate all the functionalities
SalesRevenueReport
Represents the class that is used to perform analysis on the sales made
Staff
Stores the detaisl pertaining to a single staff
Table
Stores the details of a single table (corresponding to a particular pax)
